code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Container,Title,OrderList,OrderItem,OrderHeader,OrderInfo,OrderStatus,ProductList,ProductItem,ProductImage,ProductDetails,ProductPrice,EmptyState,Loading,Error}from'./styles/Orders.styles';import{orderService}from'../services/orderService';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Orders=()=>{const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');const{user}=useAuth();useEffect(()=>{const fetchOrders=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const data=await orderService.getOrders();setOrders(data);setError('');}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching orders:',error);setError('Failed to load orders. Please try again later.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(user){fetchOrders();}},[user]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{children:"Loading your orders..."})});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{children:error})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{children:"Your Orders"}),orders.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(EmptyState,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"No orders found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You haven't placed any orders yet."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.location.href='/',style:{padding:'12px 24px',backgroundColor:'teal',color:'white',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Start Shopping"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderList,{children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(OrderItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(OrderHeader,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(OrderInfo,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Order #",order._id.slice(-8).toUpperCase()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Placed on ",new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total: $",order.amount]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderStatus,{status:order.status||'processing',children:order.status||'Processing'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductList,{children:order.products.map((product,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ProductItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductImage,{src:product.img||'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1560769629-975ec94e6a86?w=100',alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ProductDetails,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",product.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Color: ",product.color||'Black'," | Size: ",product.size||'M']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ProductPrice,{children:["$",product.price]})]},index))})]},order._id))})]});};export default Orders;
